attributes.action: Give football clubs same number of live games a season.Stop Sky Sports ruling!
attributes.additional_details: So please sign if you support that sky pick their games in June and more clubs get a fair share of tv money. Even though matches should be 3pm on a Saturday.
attributes.background: Sky TV are set to announce Leeds v Middlesbrough on February 15th. I am a Leeds season ticket holder and fed up of sky dictating football matches. Each club should have the same number of live games in a season. Live matches should be picked when the fixtures are out in June too.
